Dialogue.Page: You're finally awake! And just in time, too.
I spotted a strange object approaching our solar system. It looks sort of like a planet, but... You'd best see for yourself.
I know this is your first solo flight, but you're the only one available to investigate.
Theree isn't much time before it leaves the system. Do you think you could go there?

DialogueOption.Text: Of course! It sounds like a great adventure.

Dialogue.Page: This is exciting, an actual extrasolar planet! Imagine what we can learn from it!
I knew you were a real explorer! Good luck, out there!
I hope you do, this is our only chance before it leaves the star system!
